[City Ordinances](https://www.ennistx.gov/City-Ordinances "City Ordinances")
[Everbridge Emergency Notification System](https://member.everbridge.net/index/453003085611673 "Everbridge Emergency Notification System")

The Office of the City Manager reports to the City Commission and is responsible for the day-to-day management of and the long-range planning for the City of Ennis (28.03 square mile land area and a 2022 population of 22,00).  The City Manager manages the activities of nineteen City Departments comprised of 250 full-time equivalent employees. The City of Ennis provides a full range of municipal services including police and fire protection; health, sanitation and code enforcement services; recreational and cultural activities; construction and maintenance of streets, highways and infrastructure; and utility services (water and wastewater services).

[**Administrative Staff Directory**](https://www.ennistx.gov/departments/staff_directory/Administration/)
